alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 04 at 4:01AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Sea Levels Sunday Night Through Tuesday... Water levels will begin rising along the Arctic Coast from Utqiagvik west on Sunday night, with the highest levels expected on Monday. Water may push up on top of the sea ice, and could cause ice to pile up on beaches from Utqiagvik west. No infrastructure flooding is expected at this time. Residents with belongings along the coast should move items inland from the beach. A series of strong storms moving north over the Bering and Chukchi Seas through early next week will bring strong southerly winds across the Bering and Chukchi Seas. The strong southerly winds will bring elevated sea levels from Utqiagvik west Sunday night through Tuesday.

area.areaDesc: Northern Arctic Coast; Western Arctic Coast
